title: Episode 194: The 2021 Gift Guide
itunes:title: Episode 194: The 2021 Gift Guide
itunes:subtitle: Kate and Doree present the fourth annual Forever35 gift guide for the 2021 holiday season! They’ve got something for everyone on your list: skincare obsessives, candle enthusiasts, readers, game-lovers, kids, and more. - To leave a voicemail or text...
description:
Kate and Doree present the fourth annual Forever35 gift guide for the 2021 holiday season! They’ve got something for everyone on your list: skincare obsessives, candle enthusiasts, readers, game-lovers, kids, and more.


  • To leave a voicemail or text for a future episode, reach them at 781-591-0390. You can also email the podcast at forever35podcast@gmail.com.
  • Visit forever35podcast.com for links to everything they mention on the show.
  • Follow the podcast on Twitter (@Forever35Pod) and Instagram (@Forever35Podcast) and join the Forever35 Facebook Group (Password: Serums). 
  • Sign up for the newsletter! At forever35podcast.com/newsletter


This episode is sponsored by:

BETTER HELP - Get 10% off your first month with the discount code FOREVER35. Go to betterhelp.com/FOREVER35 to get started today.


BILLIE - Go to MyBillie.com/FOREVER35 and get your $9 starter kit today. 


TURBIE TWIST - Visit turbietwist.com/podcast to receive 15 percent off with discount code PODCAST. 


STORYWORTH - For $10 off, visit storyworth.com/forever35.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
